question:
You recently did a short cookery course. The cookery school has asked for your feedback on the course.
Write a letter to the course director at the cookery school. In your letter
Describe what you enjoyed about the course
say how much cooking you have done since the course
Suggest another cookery course you would like the school to offer
text: I am writing this letter in connection with the cookery course I took last summer and to make suggestions for further classes. I believe it is in your best interest to hold better courses.

Actually, I have enjoyed taking part in the Italian food course  very much. The reason why I had a great time was mostly because of our professional tutor whom I learned has high-ranked restaurants both in New York and Rome. What amazed me the most was the state-of-the-art the art equipment each class is provided with.
I have been cooking different Italian meals ever since and the one that I master is bacon spaghetti. I have made various scrumptious pizzas and my family is super content with my cooking lately.

anyway, I would like to offer some suggestions on further courses which I would like to take part in. If it is possible, I would like you to have a pastry course especially for Turkish sweets such as baklava which is one of the most popular sweets all around the world these days. I am sure if you offer a wider range of classes, the Academy will continue to run profitably as more students you were able to attract.
This is all I would like to share with you. Thank you for taking the time to read this letter.
